snowDescription: Why did the snowman call his friend a flake? Because he was 'chilling'!
How do you find Will Smith in the snow? You look for fresh prints!
What do snowmen wear on their heads? Ice caps!
Why don't snowmen like parties? They always end up getting 'snowed' in!
What's a snowman's favorite snack? Ice Krispie treats!
Why did the snowman go to school? To improve his 'flakiness'!
What do you call a snowman with a six-pack? An abdominal snowman!
What do you get when you cross a snowman and a dog? Frostbite!
What do you call a snowman with a temper? A meltdown waiting to happen!
Why did the snowman bring a map? Because it wanted to 'drift' away!
